scripts.start: pwd && concurrently "cd app2 && yarn dev" "cd shell && yarn dev "
scripts.build: pwd && concurrently  "cd app2 && yarn build" "cd shell && yarn build "
scripts.serve: pwd && concurrently  "cd app2 && yarn start" "cd shell && yarn start "
scripts.postinstall: pwd && concurrently "cd app2 && yarn" "cd shell && yarn"
